TopicTitle: Blue Origin Remake most fitting engine?

Articles.Content:
Hi so i'm making a Blue Origin, New Shepard replica but i don't know what engine would look the best?

so far i'm thinking of using the "S3 KS-25 "Vector" Engine"

what do you think?

Naw, the Vector is an immensely powerful engine for large lifters.  Single-stage suborbital shot for six crew?  Should be fine with a Swivel, or at MOST a Skipper.

That's according to stats - TWR, thrust, atmo ISP, etc.  If it's looks you're after, I'd still play with those engines and clipping into tanks and adapters to get the look right.  

But really, nothing wrong with the heavy, expensive, overpowered Vector if that's the one you want to use.  The inefficiencies with it only matter in career runs...

Here is the booster so far i just tested it out with a passenger both successfully landed

http://imgur.com/a/paWJP
